remarks.title: REMARKS:
notes: In addition to NACE MR103, project specification DRP001-PUC-SPE-W-000-003 MATERIAL REQUIREMENTS FOR WET H2S SERVICE shall be followed.
In addition to Table 14 for pressure casing material inspection requirements, Project specifications DRP001-PUC-SPE-R-000-005 Centrifugal Pumps shall be followed.
Project specification DRP001-PUC-SPE-W-000-005 MATERIAL REQUIREMENTS FOR ALKALINE SERVICE shall be followed.
